channel.title: Others on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Others on A Hugo website

item.title: Clinical notes: Health Disparities
item.description: People in low-socioeconomic status are at a high risk of diseases and death. I saw two patients both diagnosed with intracranial tuberculoma. One of them was a middle-aged and high-income man. He lived in a VIP ward for three months. He even wanted to live in the ward for several more days, after the doctors said that he is fully recovered. The other one is a 19-year-old rural boy, he came to city alone for a higher salary work.

item.title: How does pescetarian diet affect health: An breif human experiment
item.description: Introduction To evaluate the effect the health effect of pescetarian diet, an two-monthâ€™s intervention study was conducted on a 19-year-old female, from April, 6th to Jun 12th, in 2019. Food frequency questionnaire were answered by the participant at baseline. Blood glucose, hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c), blood urea nitrogen (BUN), high-density lipoprotein (HDL), low-density lipoprotein (LDL), height and body weight were measured at both baseline and follow-up. Limitations The sample size is only one, because the author fail to find more volunteer to participate in this study.
